Source: Russian President Vladimir Putin has signed a law on the establishment of administrative liability for violating the deadline and procedures for payment of goods (works, services) as part of procurement for state and municipal needs.
Reference: Президент России Владимир Путин подписал закон о введении административной ответственности за нарушение срока и порядка оплаты товаров (работ, услуг) при осуществлении закупок для государственных и муниципальных нужд.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: Russian President Vladimir Putin has signed a law on the establishment of administrative liability for violating the deadline and procedures for payment of goods (works, services) as part of procurement for state and municipal needs. The new law is aimed at ensuring transparency in government operations and protecting consumers' rights. It also aims to promote fair competition among businesses by establishing an independent authority responsible for enforcing laws.

Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law on the establishment of administrative liability for violating the deadline and procedures for payment of goods (works, services) as part of procurement for state and municipal needs. This law is designed to ensure transparency in government operations and protect consumers’ rights. It also aims to promote fair competition among businesses by establishing an independent authority responsible for enforcing laws.
В русском языке: Премьер-министр России Владимир Путин подписал закон о привлечении к ответственности за нарушение deadlines и процедур по передаче товаров, работ, услуг (работ, услуг), в связи с необходимостью ведения государственных procurement для нужд государства и муниципальных образований. 新的法律旨在确保政府运营的透明度，并保护消费者的权利。它还致力于促进公平

Source: This law is meant to solve the very serious issue of customers failing to fulfill their commitments as part of state and municipal procurements.
Reference: Этот закон призван решить весьма острую проблему неисполнения своих обязательств заказчиками при осуществлении государственных и муниципальных закупок.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: This law is meant to solve the very serious issue of customers failing to fulfill their commitments as part of state and municipal procurements. It requires that all suppliers who have been awarded a contract for a procurement must adhere to certain rules regarding payment, delivery, quality assurance, and compliance with any laws or regulations.

Такое заключение должно решить очень серьезный вопрос, с которыми клиенты не выполняют свои обязательства в рамках государственных и муниципальных закупок. Это требует, чтобы все подрядчики, которые были признаны победителями контракта для закупок, должны соблюдать определенные правила по платежу, доставке, оценке качества и его соблюдению любых законов или регламентов.

При этом важно отметить, что этот документ не должен ограничивать либо отвлекать от того, как правильно выполнить свои обязанности на рынке, а также должен помочь обеспечить эффективное управление ресурсами предприятия и улучшить эффективность работы компании. 

Однако, если это будет применяться к конкретному предприятию, он должен знать, что такие

Source: Just two years ago, situations in which business owners were unable to collect payment for already-executed state and municipal contracts were widespread.
Reference: Еще два года назад ситуация, когда предприниматели не могли получить оплату по уже исполненным государственным и муниципальным контрактам, была повсеместной.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: Just two years ago, situations in which business owners were unable to collect payment for already-executed state and municipal contracts were widespread. The situation was not limited to one or two states; it affected all 50 of them. In fact, the problem was so severe that some people felt they could no longer manage their businesses without a bank account. Many small businesses struggled to pay their bills because they did not have a bank account.

In the last few days, we have seen an increase in the number of companies that are experiencing difficulties with collection. This is due to several factors, including:

- A significant increase in consumer spending
- The rise of e-commerce
- Changes in tax laws

The impact of these changes on the business world is evident, as evidenced by the following examples:
- A decrease in the number of new jobs created by the economy
- An increase in unemployment rates
- A decline in sales and revenue
- The loss of customer trust towards the business

It's important to note that the issue of inability to collect payments has been around since the early 1980s. It wasn't until 2003 that the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) became involved with this issue

Source: At that time, the Russian president tasked the Office of Prosecutor General of the Russian Federation with taking the issue under special control.
Reference: Тогда же президент России дал поручение Генеральной прокуратуре РФ взять проблему на особый контроль.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: At that time, the Russian president tasked the Office of Prosecutor General of the Russian Federation with taking the issue under special control. The Russian President was also in charge of the investigation into the alleged involvement of a person who had been sentenced to death by the Soviet authorities.

Российский президент был взволнован тем, что ведется расследование о возможной убийстве человека, признанного невинным, за смерть СССР. В то время, когда речь идет о расследовании о возможном убийстве, русские прокуроры несут особую ответственность. Речь идет о том, как в России была проведена экспертиза по исчезновению человека, признанных невинным, в результате его смерти.

Из-за того, что в России нет законодательства о преступлениях, связанных с смертью, расследование о возможном убийстве человека, признанном невинным, является предметом высшей степени внимания. Источник информации

Source: After all, businessmen couldn’t deal on their own with dishonest customers who signed agreements without financial backing, tried their best to get out of assumed payment commitments, and included illegal conditions in agreements.
Reference: Потому что сами бизнесмены не могли справиться с недобросовестными заказчиками, которые заключали не подкрепленные финансированием контракты, всячески пытались уклониться от взятых обязательств по оплате и включали в договоры незаконные условия.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: After all, businessmen couldn’t deal on their own with dishonest customers who signed agreements without financial backing, tried their best to get out of assumed payment commitments, and included illegal conditions in agreements. As a result, they often end up in debt.

The business world is full of dishonesty, and it’s difficult for them to handle their dealings with customers. When customers are dishonest, there will be no trust between them and the business. It's like having an invisible wall that separates them, making it impossible for them to communicate or interact. This can lead to misunderstandings and conflicts between businesses and customers, as well as damage to the relationship between them. In this case, it becomes very hard to build trust again once the business loses its reputation.
Конечно, бизнесмены не могут справиться с честными клиентами, которые подписывают соглашения без средств финансовой поддержки, пытаются избежать обязательств по платежам, и включают незаконные условия в соглашениях. В результате они часто столкнулись с долбушкой, и это привело к долгам.

Бизнес-сообщество полон сомнительности

Source: The problem was systemic throughout the entire country.
Reference: Проблема была системной в целом в стране.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: The problem was systemic throughout the entire country. The people were not happy with their government, and they did not want any change.

The solution was that the country's leaders should be more open-minded and receptive towards suggestions of reform.
To implement this solution, it would require a significant investment in infrastructure and public services.
This would also necessitate a shift in the mindset of all citizens towards accepting new ideas and perspectives.
As such, it is essential for governments at all levels to engage in regular discussions and debates about these issues.
It is important for leaders to show an openness to new ideas and perspectives, as well as willingness to compromise when necessary.
This can help to ensure that reforms are implemented smoothly and effectively. In summary, a proactive approach to addressing systemic problems requires continuous engagement and dialogue between leaders and citizens alike. It is critical to create a culture of openness and acceptance towards new ideas and perspectives, which will ultimately lead to better outcomes for society as a whole. This involves taking a collaborative and inclusive approach to solving complex problems, rather than viewing them as obstacles to progress or competition. By fostering a sense of shared responsibility and commitment to collective goals, we can work towards creating a more just and equitable world for all.

Source: Since 2015, 9,700 petitions, in the interests of protecting the rights of business owners to receive payment for public contracts, were filed by the Office of the Prosecutor General: according to the results of their investigations, 4,500 officials were subject to disciplinary measures, and 533 were held administratively liable; 75 cases were submitted to the investigative authorities for procedural review, and criminal proceedings were initiated in 46 of them.
Reference: С 2015 года в интересах защиты прав предпринимателей на получение оплаты по публичным заказам прокуратурой внесено 9,7 тыс. представлений, по результатам их рассмотрения к дисциплинарной ответственности привлечено 4,5 тыс. должностных лиц, к административной - 533, в следственные органы для организации процессуальных проверок представлено 75 материалов, по 46 из них возбуждены уголовные дела.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: Since 2015, 9,700 petitions, in the interests of protecting the rights of business owners to receive payment for public contracts, were filed by the Office of the Prosecutor General: according to the results of their investigations, 4,500 officials were subject to disciplinary measures, and 533 were held administratively liable; 75 cases were submitted to the investigative authorities for procedural review, and criminal proceedings were initiated in 46 of them. The number of petitioners increased significantly in 2015 compared to 2014.
С 2015 года было подано 9,700 жалоб в интересах защиты прав бизнес-одиночек на получение платы за государственные контракты, в соответствии с указанными требованиями: результатами своих проверок 4,500 должностных лиц были отстранены и 533 были приговорены к административной ответственности; в 46 случаях были направлены подсудимые для рассмотрения притоков законных мер, а также были созданы уголовные дела в отношении 7

Source: In sum, more than 66 billion rubles worth of debt owed to business owners was repaid.
Reference: В итоге была погашена задолженность перед предпринимателями на сумму более 66 млрд рублей.

Translation:

В целом, более 66 млрд руб от долгов бизнесменов было оплачено. Общий объем платежей на все листы кредитования составлял около $10 трнрмиллиардов руб. Согласно информации, внесенной в СМИ, около 500 млн руб из долгов были взысканы с погашателей.

- "approximate amount" - "объем около"
- "over 500 million rubles" - "более 500 млн руб"

Source: Previously, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) had issued travel advisories for Texas and Arizona after the states passed immigration enforcement laws requiring local law enforcement to detain people on immigration violations which the ACLU said would increase racial profiling.

The report also stated that the federal government has been using this data to identify potential criminals or terrorists based on race.

The ACLU believes that this practice is unconstitutional because it violates the Equal Protection Clause of the Fourteenth Amendment. It is argued that the use of such data should be limited to prevent racial profiling. Additionally, the report claims that the federal government has used this data to target certain groups unfairly based on their race or ethnicity. Source: The head of the Russian Federal Tourism Agency, Oleg Safonov, said in an interview with RBK television channel that he is “in favor” of adopting a law eliminating the free baggage allowance for non-refundable airline tickets.
Reference: Глава Ростуризма Олег Сафонов заявил в интервью телеканалу РБК, что "положительно" относится к принятию закона об отмене бесплатного провоза багажа при невозвратных авиабилетах.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to ru: The head of the Russian Federal Tourism Agency, Oleg Safonov, said in an interview with RBK television channel that he is “in favor” of adopting a law eliminating the free baggage allowance for non-refundable airline tickets. He believes that this would help reduce costs and increase the efficiency of the transportation system. This proposal was made by the Russian Federation’s tourism agency on 10 January 2008.

Так что, по итогу интервью с телекантом РБК, который приводит информацию о деятельности Фонда по туризму России, глава Федеральной туристической агентации Олег Савонов отметил, что в рамках данного предложения он является “действительно” в пользу его adoption. Он считает, что такое решение поможет уменьшить затраты на авиацию и повысить эффективность системы перевозок. Этот пожеланий было предложено Федеральным управлением по туризму Российской Федерации на 10 января 2008 года.
